name: goerli-diva.public.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Liquid Staking protocol powered by Distributed Validators (DVT).
description:
Diva is an Ethereum Liquid Staking protocol powered by Distributed Validator Technology (DVT).

It extends Ethereum's Proof of Stake providing new functionality for Stakers and Operators:

- **Liquid Stakers** receive divETH, a [Liquid Staking Token](https://docs.staking.foundation/lst) which accrues Ethereum [Staking Rewards](https://docs.staking.foundation/staking-rewards).
- **Operators** run a [**Di**stributed **Va**lidation node](https://docs.staking.foundation/operators) to fulfill staking duties and earn additional [Operator Rewards](https://docs.staking.foundation/economics).

Ethereum's staking rewards are distributed among the Diva network participants according to their contributions.

divETH is a receipt token and its balance updates daily to reflect the deposited ETH balance plus its accrued Ethereum staking rewards.

While other solutions have some of these features, **Diva is the first solution that fully integrates Liquid Staking with [Distributed Validation](https://docs.staking.foundation/dvt)**, offering both Liquid Stakers and Operators the most efficient functionality.
author: Bertho
